name: WasdTyper
description:
Launcher 

This is a launcher that automatically downloads/updates the game as well as opens it.

Game

The game is a typeracer type of game although you only use the w,a,s and d buttons. You race against your highscores and your friend's highscores. The game has an online leaderboard and that means you can beat the world records.

How to download?

1. Download the .zip file.

2. Extract the file by right clicking on it and press Extract all.

3. Open the extracted file and locate the .exe file named Launcher.exe.

4. Open the .exe file and the program should do all the stuff for you.

Latest Versions

Launcher: 0.1

Game: 0.2
